mapper.sql: id, leiXing, shiJian, dangAnId, zhuangTai, jieShouRenId
mapper.insert:
insert into gongzuojilu
id,
leiXing,
shiJian,
dangAnId,
zhuangTai,
jieShouRenId,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{leixing,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{shijian,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{danganid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{zhuangtai,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{jieshourenid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update gongzuojilu
leiXing = #{leixing,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shiJian = #{shijian,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dangAnId = #{danganid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
zhuangTai = #{zhuangtai,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jieShouRenId = #{jieshourenid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update gongzuojilu set leiXing = #{leixing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shiJian = #{shijian,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dangAnId = #{danganid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, zhuangTai = #{zhuangtai,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jieShouRenId = #{jieshourenid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select g.id,g.neiRong,g.shiJian,r.xingMing from gongzuojilu as g,renyuandangan as r where g.dangAnId=r.id and (g.dangAnId=#{dangAnId} or g.jieShouRenId=#{dangAnId});
select count(id) from gongzuojilu where dangAnId=#{dangAnId} and zhuangTai=0;
select count(id) from bumen where dangAnId=#{dangAnId}
select dangAnId from bumen,renyuandangan where renyuandangan.id=#{dangAnId} and bumen.id=renyuandangan.buMenId

select g.id,g.neiRong,g.shiJian,g.leiXing,(select xingMing from renyuandangan where renyuandangan.id=g.dangAnId) as xingMing ,(select xingMing from renyuandangan where id=g.jieShouRenId) as pingLunRen from gongzuojilu as g where dangAnId=#{dangAnId} and zhuangTai=-1
mapper.insert: insert into gongzuojilu(leiXing, shiJian, dangAnId, zhuangTai, jieShouRenId, neiRong, riZhiPingLunId) values(#{leiXing},now(),#{dangAnId},-1,#{jieShouRenId},#{neiRong},#{riZhiPingLunId});
mapper.update: update gongzuojilu set zhuangTai=1 where id=#{id} and dangAnId=#{dangAnId}
mapper.select: select g.id,g.neiRong,g.shiJian,g.dangAnId,g.leiXing,(select renyuandangan.xingMing from oadb.renyuandangan where renyuandangan.id=g.dangAnId) as xingMing, g.zhuangTai,g.jieShouRenId,(select id from rizhipinglun where riZhiId=g.id) as riZhiPingLunId,(select r.pingLunNeiRong from oadb.rizhipinglun as r where g.id =r.riZhiId) as pingLunNeiRong,(select r.riQi from oadb.rizhipinglun as r where g.id =r.riZhiId) as riQi, (select renyuandangan.xingMing from oadb.renyuandangan where renyuandangan.id= g.jieShouRenId) as pingLunRen from oadb.gongzuojilu g where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 90 DAY) <= shiJian and g.dangAnId=#{dangAnId} and g.zhuangTai !=-1

select g.id,g.neiRong,g.shiJian,g.dangAnId,g.leiXing,(select renyuandangan.xingMing from oadb.renyuandangan where renyuandangan.id=g.dangAnId) as xingMing, g.zhuangTai,g.jieShouRenId,(select id from rizhipinglun where riZhiId=g.id) as riZhiPingLunId,(select r.pingLunNeiRong from oadb.rizhipinglun as r where g.id =r.riZhiId) as pingLunNeiRong,(select r.riQi from oadb.rizhipinglun as r where g.id =r.riZhiId) as riQi, (select renyuandangan.xingMing from oadb.renyuandangan where renyuandangan.id= g.jieShouRenId) as pingLunRen from oadb.gongzuojilu g where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 90 DAY) <= shiJian and g.jieShouRenId=#{dangAnId} and g.zhuangTai!=-1

select g.id,g.neiRong,g.shiJian,g.dangAnId,g.leiXing,(select renyuandangan.xingMing from oadb.renyuandangan where renyuandangan.id=g.dangAnId) as xingMing, g.zhuangTai,g.jieShouRenId,(select id from rizhipinglun where riZhiId=g.id) as riZhiPingLunId,(select r.pingLunNeiRong from oadb.rizhipinglun as r where g.id =r.riZhiId) as pingLunNeiRong,(select r.riQi from oadb.rizhipinglun as r where g.id =r.riZhiId) as riQi, (select renyuandangan.xingMing from oadb.renyuandangan where renyuandangan.id= g.jieShouRenId) as pingLunRen from oadb.gongzuojilu g where g.id=#{id} and g.jieShouRenId=#{dangAnId} and g.zhuangTai !=-1
mapper.update: update gongzuojilu set gongzuojilu.zhuangTai=1 where gongzuojilu.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into gongzuojilu(leiXing, shiJian, dangAnId, zhuangTai, jieShouRenId, neiRong) values (#{leiXing},#{shiJian},#{dangAnId},0,#{jieShouRenId},#{neiRong})
